1:
CIRCULAR 28 / 2000 
 
 
 
Subject: 
ACCESS OF VEHICLES UP TO THE AIRCRAFT AT CIVIL AIRPORTS 
IN THE COUNTRY ON PROTOCOL / SECURITY / MEDICAL 
GROUNDS. 
 
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No. 7 / 1999 dated 26.04.99 and 15/1999 dated 
29.07,1999on the subject cited above. 
 
 
The following amendments / additions in the above Circular may please be made: - 
 
Protocol Category 
 
 
 
I am directed to convey the approval of the Government for allowing the vehicle of 
the Governor of Sikkim up to the aircraft at Bagdogra airport. 
 
 (R.K SINGH) 
Addl Commissioner of Security (CA) 
for Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
NO.CAS-8(1) / 99 / DIV-I 
Dated : 13.10.2000
